tags: None
review:
Many years back, I met with an accident which left my upper lip with a little extrusion tissue as part of recovery.
This led me to hesitating to smile as often as I used to...
I finally decided to get this corrected before my marriage for that perfect smiling pictures!
I did consulted 2-3 doctors before I finally underwent the knife. What I really liked about Dr Angad that he explained the process very elaborately and also told the risks associated with the procedure very upfront.
The clinic charged me very reasonably as compared to other places I had consulted.
I am writing this review almost after 2 months so as to see any post surgery side effects. So far I am extremely satisfied with the whole experience and I recommend that one should really visit this clinic before finalising a procedure at other clinics in Kandivali area.
reply_text: Thank you so much Suraj for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Brilliant and explicit treatment by the doctor. It was done with so much ease  didn't Feel any  sort of pain . He precisely explained everything   about the procedure which was easily understandable cleared all my queries  . Gave me mutiple breaks as and when required.made sure I was comfortable all the time.   Kept me aware about everything .  so calm, very friendly ,Kind and understanding ....  super sweet doctor . I've had 3 wisdom teeth extraction and it was a wonderful experience to be treated by doctor Angad.  Clearly explains after surgery care in thorough detail prescribes medicines that eases the pain . HIGHLY RECOMMENDED .  Thank you for being the best surgeon ever . It was a pleasure to have been treated under u .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Oral Surgery Procedures,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review: Great overall experience* *** ***** ****** ** **** ************ ** *** ****** *********** I especially appreciate that he took his time to explain my conditions with me as well as my discuss treatment options and thier future pros/cons in detail, and helps take decision in our best interest. A very good expereince, highly satisfied with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you Ankit for your kind words.

review: It was great experience, clarity in treatment,definitely would like to recommend for family and friends.

review: ********* ****** *** completed my RC as well as fitted ceramic Cap. Pays attention to minute details and takes all possible precautions that are good for patients. Empathetic to the concerns of his patients.
